extensionDescription.message: Various styling and QoL fixes for the BIU Lamda platform. All features are toggable.

settingsTitle.description: Title that appears in the settings page, and when hovering over the options button in the toolbar

settingTitleCourseListRevamp.description: The title in the settings page for the Course List Revamp setting

settingTitlePaddingMargin.description: The title in the settings page for the Padding-Margin setting

settingTitleRestoreOldIcons.description: The title in the settings page for the Restore Old Icons setting

settingDescCourseListRevamp.message: Improves the course list in the left sidebar
settingDescCourseListRevamp.description: The description in the settings page for the Course List Revamp setting

settingDescPaddingMargin.message: Increases space utilization by reducing the amount of wasted whitespace
settingDescPaddingMargin.description: The description in the settings page for the Padding-Margin setting

settingDescRestoreOldIcons.message: Replaces the new, monotone icons with the old icons and other colorful icons
settingDescRestoreOldIcons.description: The description in the settings page for the Restore Old Icons setting

reloadPageMsg.message: Reload the page to apply changes :)
reloadPageMsg.description: Reminds the user to reload the page after changin a setting
